text: The Houston Aeros were an American professional ice hockey team that played from 1994 to 2013 in the American Hockey League. They played in Houston, Texas at the Toyota Center. On April 19, 2013, it was announced that the team would move to Des Moines, Iowa at the beginning of the 2013â€“14 AHL season and would be known as the Iowa Wild. ==References== ==Other websites== *Houston Aeros' Official Site Category:Defunct American Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Minnesota Wild Category:Sports in Houston Category:1994 establishments in Texas Category:2013 disestablishments in the United States Category:21st-century disestablishments in Texas
title: Houston Aeros
